course.title: Abnormal Psychology
course.meeting_text: Tu., Th., 1-2:30 and a weekly section to be arranged
course.description: Introduction to the study of psychological dysfunction. Focuses on abnormal behavior as it relates to the definition, etiology, and treatment of major symptom domains. This course will emphasize critical evaluation of the causes and mechanisms of mental illness, with special attention paid to recent neuroscientific and genetic research on the neurobiology of psychopathology.
course.notes: This course counts toward foundational requirements for Psychology and should be taken before courses at the 1000 level or higher.
